channel.title: Help Needed With uTorrent, No-IP, Portforwarding
channel.description:
I'm running "Bluurrs Client" and using "Pwnscape" as the source.
I have a no-ip named "stalkerish.no-ip.org" and this is where I need the help.
From here I don't know anything about what to do with uTorrent and no-ip
So what im basically trying to do is let people connect to the client online, if someone can explain how to do that it would be a major help
Thanks :)

item.title: Help Needed With uTorrent, No-IP, Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

Go to 192.168.1.1 to portforward on router.

Read full topic
item.source: Help Needed With uTorrent, No-IP, Portforwarding

item.title: Help Needed With uTorrent, No-IP, Portforwarding

item.description:
@Stalkerish wrote:

Well I just need the best way to put my server online as fast as possible… I would really appreciate it

Read full topic

item.title: Help Needed With uTorrent, No-IP, Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

Dont advertise your ip ( When it runs). Dont use uTorrent port forwarding your server will lag badly.

So what im basically trying to do is let people connect to the client online
Do you mean webclient?

Read full topic
item.source: Help Needed With uTorrent, No-IP, Portforwarding
